00027 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00028 #ifndef __DELTA_SIGMA_ADC_H
00029 #define __DELTA_SIGMA_ADC_H
00030 
00031 #ifdef __cplusplus
00032  extern "C" {
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00036 #define HTCFH_I2C_MASTER_CLOCK_SPEED              (100000)
00037 #define HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS                  (0x0A)
00038 #define HFCFG_I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS                   (0x68)
00039 
00040 #define ADC_SKIP_COUNT                            (3) // Skip first n times of sample
00041 
00042 #define VCMEN   1       // VCM function - 0: Disable, 1: Enable
00043 
00044 #define FADCK   0x28    // Performance optimizing bits - 0x28: fADCK = fMCLK/30, 0x2C: fADCK = fMCLK/12
00045 
00046 #define VGS     0       // VREF gain - 0: VREFGN = 1
00047                         //             1: VREFGN = 1/2
00048                         //             2: VREFGN = 1/4
00049 
00050 #define AGS     0       // ADC gain - 0: ADGN = 1, 1: ADGN = 2 (for Gain = 128 = PGAGNxADGN = 64x2)
00051 
00052 #define PGS     5       // PGA gain - 0: PGAGN = 1
00053                         //            1: PGAGN = 2
00054                         //            2: PGAGN = 4
00055                         //            3: PGAGN = 8
00056                         //            4: PGAGN = 16
00057                         //            5: PGAGN = 32
00058                         //            6: PGAGN = 64
00059 
00060 #define INIS    0       // Input short - 0: Disable,  1: Enable
00061 #define INX     0       // Input change- 0: Nochange
00062                         //               1: Short IN2
00063                         //               2: Short IN1
00064                         //               3: Exchange
00065 
00066 #define DCSET   0       // Differential input signal  - 0 : 0V
00067                         //                              1 : 0.25 VR
00068                         //                              2 : 0.5 VR
00069                         //                              3 : 0.75 VR
00070                         //                              5 : -0.25 VR
00071                         //                              6 : -0.5 VR
00072                         //                              7 : -0.75 VR
00073 
00074 #define CHSN    0       //  PGA negative input - 0: AN1
00075                         //                       1: AN3
00076                         //                       4: VDACO
00077                         //                       5: AVSS
00078                         //                       6: VCM
00079                         //                       7: VTSN (Temperature sensor negative output)
00080 
00081 #define CHSP    0       // PGA positive input - 0: AN0
00082                         //                      1: AN2
00083                         //                      4: VDACO
00084                         //                      6: VCM
00085                         //                      7: VTSP (Temperature sensor positive output)
00086 
00087 #define ADOR    1       // Oversampling rate - 0: OSR = 32768
00088                         //                     1: OSR = 16384
00089                         //                     2: OSR = 8192
00090                         //                     3: OSR = 4096
00091                         //                     4: OSR = 2048
00092                         //                     5: OSR = 1024
00093                         //                     6: OSR = 512
00094                         //                     7: OSR = 256
00095                         //                     8: OSR = 128
00096 
00097 #define VREFS   1       // Reference voltage pair - 0: Internal VCM & AVSS
00098                         //                          1: External VREFP & VREFN
00099 
00100 #define FLMS    0       // Clock divided ratio - 0: N = 30, 1: N = 12
00101 
00102 #define VRBUF   0       // VRN & VRP Reference buffer - 0: Disable
00103                         //                              1: Enable VRP
00104                         //                              2: Enable VRN
00105                         //                              3: Enable VRN & VRP
00106 
00107 #define ADCK    0x1F    // Clock source fMCLK  divided ratio - 0x00 ~ 0x1E: fMCLK =fSYS / 2 / (ADCK + 1)
00108                         //                                             0x1E: fMCLK =fSYS
00109 
00110 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00111 void ADC24_Init(void);
00112 void ADC24_Start(void);
00113 void ADC24_Stop(void);
00114 u32 ADC24_ReadData_MainRoutine(s32 *pBuffer);
00115 void ADC24_IRQHandler(void);
00116 
00117 void ADC24_WriteRegNonBlock(u32 uAddr, u32 uValue);
00118 void ADC24_WriteReg(u32 uAddr, u32 uValue);
00119 
00120 void ADC24_ReadRegNonBlock(u32 uAddr, u8 *pBuffer, u32 uLen);
00121 void ADC24_ReadReg(u32 uAddr, u8 *pBuffer, u32 uLen);
00122 
00123 void ADC24_AccessWaiting(void);
00124 
00125 #ifdef __cplusplus
00126 }
00127 #endif

00129 #endif
